title: I’m No Longer Sure New York Will Protect Itself From Rising Waters
description: Given the funding gaps and ever-extending deadlines for flood protection measures, is it better to be realistic about Manhattan’s future?
dc:creator: Marco Pasanella

media:content.media:credit: Evelyn Freja for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Marco Pasanella, owner of Pasanella & Son, Vintners, lost 10,000 bottles of wine in Hurricane Sandy in 2012.
